channel.title: Dear Stage Archives - VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: Yumemi Nemu Official MMD Model Released!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
Earlier in the year we were teased of a Yumemi Nemu MMD model to celebrate the V4 release of both her and her counterpart, Tone Rion V4. And now, at long last, she’s available for download! About the Model Nemu’s MMD perfectly mirrors the VOCALOID’s adorable look – with the long, yet loose, knee-high socks …

The post Yumemi Nemu Official MMD Model Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Earlier in the year we were teased of a Yumemi Nemu MMD model to celebrate the V4 release of both her and her counterpart, Tone Rion V4. And now, at long last, she’s available for download!

About the Model

Nemu’s MMD perfectly mirrors the VOCALOID’s adorable look – with the long, yet loose, knee-high socks to the large, white and grey coat that covers her entire hands! Yukiko Horiguchi (堀口悠紀子) is the designer of the the model while Tamataro (タマタロー) handled the modeling.

We first got a glimpse of Nemu’s MMD model back in July when Denpagumi Inc. uploaded a short video to the song “Arui wa Yumemi Nemu to Iu Gainen e no Succeed” on their official YouTube channel, which you can check out below.

She is available for free download at Nemu and Rion’s website. Just be sure to read the terms of service outlined on the download page and select the box that says you agree to them.

The post Yumemi Nemu Official MMD Model Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nemu Yumemi’s Intermediate VOCALOID Lesson Announced, Beginner Lesson Now Online!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Always willing to show new and aspiring VOCALOID producers the ropes, Nemu Yumemi and Asin Kuroda will soon be in Shinjuku to hold another VOCALOID tutorial! Titled “Nemu Yumemi’s Exciting VOCALOID Lesson ~ Intermediate Level,” the pair will be using the VOCALOID 4 Library Yumemi Nemu to train participants on the finer points of VOCALOID …

The post Nemu Yumemi’s Intermediate VOCALOID Lesson Announced, Beginner Lesson Now Online! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Always willing to show new and aspiring VOCALOID producers the ropes, Nemu Yumemi and Asin Kuroda will soon be in Shinjuku to hold another VOCALOID tutorial! Titled “Nemu Yumemi’s Exciting VOCALOID Lesson ~ Intermediate Level,” the pair will be using the VOCALOID 4 Library Yumemi Nemu to train participants on the finer points of VOCALOID usage, following up on their previous tutorial events at Kyoto Seika University, and throughout Nagoya, Osaka, and Shibuya.

9/22（金）に新宿イーストサイドスクエアにて『夢眠ネム・チュートリアルイベント～夢眠ねむのわくわくボーカロイドレッスン・中級編～』開催決定?黒田亜津さんをゲスト講師にお迎えして『夢眠ねむ』と楽しく学びませんかこの機会に是非?https://t.co/K0naDIZHjr

— でんぱ組.inc (@dempagumi) September 12, 2017

The Nemu Yumemi tutorial event, “Nemu Yumemi’s Exciting VOCALOID Lesson ~ Intermediate Level” will be taking place at the Shinjuku Eastside Square on Friday, September 22nd!? Please welcome Asin Kuroda as the guest lecturer, and have a blast learning from Nemu Yumemi herself?

Event Details

Date & Time

September 22nd (Fri)
Doors open at 19:00 JST, event starts at 19:30 JST

Venue

1F of the Shinjuku Eastside Square

Lecturers

Nemu Yumemi as head lecturer
Asin Kuroda as guest lecturer

Tickets

Price: ￥2500 JPY
Purchase Period: September 19th (Tue) at 18:00 JST through 21st (Thur) at 23:59 JST
Purchase Method: Enter the 16-digit serial number that you received with your purchase of the VOCALOID 4 Library Yumemi Nemu in the page below:
https://l-tike.com/st1/nemu-vocaloid4/Tt/Ttg020login/top

Those who would like to catch up on Nemu Yumemi’s previous VOCALOID lesson can now watch it online!

Information Source

NemuRion Official Site
Denpagumi Inc. Official Site
Denpagumi Inc. Official Twitter

The post Nemu Yumemi’s Intermediate VOCALOID Lesson Announced, Beginner Lesson Now Online! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster Event + Song Contest Announced!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Earlier this year, VNN reported on the collaboration event between Yumemi Nemu and the arcade rhythm game Groove Coaster 3EX Dream Party. That event is now live, and Groove Coaster players can earn some nice Nemu-related rewards, including early access to several songs in her upcoming album! Yumemi Nemu in Groove Coaster 3EX Dream Party …

The post Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster Event + Song Contest Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Earlier this year, VNN reported on the collaboration event between Yumemi Nemu and the arcade rhythm game Groove Coaster 3EX Dream Party. That event is now live, and Groove Coaster players can earn some nice Nemu-related rewards, including early access to several songs in her upcoming album!

Yumemi Nemu in Groove Coaster 3EX Dream Party

Yumemi Nemu’s appearance in Groove Coaster 3EX Dream Party is a two-week-long event in which Nemu and her pet, Tanu-kyun, are available as navi and avatar characters whom players can purchase with EP (Event Points) that they earn by playing throughout the event. Furthermore, with enough EP, players can also unlock Nemu’s demo song, “Ano ne… Jitsu wa Watashi, Yumemi Nemu Nanda…” (VOCALOID version) to play in the game! Various Nemu-related titles can also be earned!

Here is a full list rewards, titles, and in-game items that are up for grabs:

  • 50 EP: Title “I Love Yumemi Nemu” + SAFE x5
  • 100 EP: Title “Yume Mist” + GC BOOSTER x5
  • 200 EP: Title “Onigiri Musha~ri!” + SAFE x5
  • 300 EP: Title “I Love Tanu-kyun” + SUPER SAFE x5
  • 400 EP: Title “Anzen Unten Onegai ne” + Tanu-kyun pixel avatar + NO WAY x5
  • 500 EP: Title “Sexy Politician” + HIDDEN x5
  • 600 EP: Title” Lovely Technician” + LONELY x5
  • 700 EP: Title “Eien no Mahou Shoujo Miman” + Yumemi Nemu pixel avatar + MIRROR x5
  • 800 EP: Title “S-Rank Wonton Noodles” + SUDDEN x5 + Song “Ano ne… Jitsu wa Watashi, Yumemi Nemu Nanda…“
  • 900 EP: Title “Yumemi-ken no Jouren” + REVERSE x5
  • 1000 EP: Title “Pure Otome (бωб)” + STEALTH x5 + Yumemi Nemu as a fully-voiced navi!

Players can also earn the following titles depending on their rankings compared to other players during the event.

Good Performance Award (Rank 1 through 1500):
Title “Mie no Kuishinbo” + MAX BOOSTER x10 + 4 trophies

Excellent Performance Award (Rank 1 through 1000):
Title “Mint-Green Space” + JUST x10 + 4 trophies

Bronze Award (Rank 1 through 500):
Title “Kagayake! Midorium!” + NOTHING x10 + 3 trophies

Silver Award (Rank 1 through 100):
Title “Kimi ni Nemu-kyun-kyun” + IMPOSSIBLE x10 + 2 trophies

Gold Award (Rank 1 through 50):
Title “N・E・M・U・G・O・D” + PERFECT PLAYER x10 + 2 trophies

Finally, numerous songs and their stages will be available for play during the event, including two tracks that can otherwise only be heard in the upcoming VOCALOID Yumemi Nemu compilation album to be released on July 5th!

  • “Ano ne… Jitsu wa Watashi, Yumemi Nemu Nanda…” (VOCALOID version) by Kiyoshi Ryujin
  • “Anzen UntenMajiko-chan” by HachiojiP
  • “Sweet☆Planet” by tilt-six and PandaBoY
  • “Alien Alien” by Nayutalien
  • “Ama no Jaku” by 164

Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster Dream Project

In other exciting news for Nemu fans, Denpagumi has announced the Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster Dream Project song contest! The contest is being held on the music hosting site ARTIST CROWD, and winning song entries in the contest will be used in Groove Coaster and other game soundtracks!

Details for the contest are as follows.

Rules

  • Create an original song using VOCALOID 4 Yumemi Nemu. (Any VOCALOID may be used for preliminary rounds, but Nemu must be used for songs that make it to the final round of judging.)
  • Original songs only; songs that have been previously uploaded online or are contracted to other publishing companies are not allowed.
  • Song entries must not infringe on any third party rights.
  • Song lyrics must also be submitted via the provided lyrics form.
  • Song lyrics cannot quote or reference other songs.
  • There is no limit to the amount of songs that a single entrant can submit.
  • When finalists are chosen, song data must be supplied for the sake of brushing up.
  • Taito Corporation will purchase the copyrights for any winning songs.
  • Any adjustments to winning song entries must be agreed upon by all parties.

Schedule

  • June 16th: Accepting entries
  • July 31st: First-round entry deadline
  • August 11th: Announcement of those who passed the first-round selection
  • September 4th: Second round entry deadline
  • September 15th: Finalists announced
  • End of September: Final judging

Judges

  • Nemu Yumemi of Denpagumi Inc.
  • Mokufu-chan
  • Hiroaki Takase of Dear Stage
  • Yamaha Corporation
  • Taito Corporation

Special Guest Judge

Susumi Kayamori of MOSAIC.WAV

Judging Criteria

  • Quality and totality of the song arrangements
  • Length of the song (2 minutes in length)
  • Use of Yumemi Nemu in the final round of judging

To enter the contest, you will first need to sign up for ARTIST CROWD here, and then register for the contest here.

Official Links

ARTIST CROWD Contest Page
Groove Coaster Official Site
Denpagumi’s Official Twitter

The post Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster Event + Song Contest Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “VOCALOID yumemi nemu” Album Now Available for Pre-order!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
As mentioned previously on VNN, nemu‘s first compilation album VOCALOID yumemi nemu is set for release in early July! After a long wait, the album is finally available for pre-order and we have a tracklist! About the Album The album costs ¥2,500 JPY (about $23 USD) and is set to release on July 5th. Tracklist 01. …

The post “VOCALOID yumemi nemu” Album Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
As mentioned previously on VNN, nemu‘s first compilation album VOCALOID yumemi nemu is set for release in early July! After a long wait, the album is finally available for pre-order and we have a tracklist!

About the Album

The album costs ¥2,500 JPY (about $23 USD) and is set to release on July 5th.

Tracklist

01. “Cosmic Melon Soda Magic Love” (by PandaBoY) w/ Yumemi Nemu [Human] 02. “Silica Gel Demo Sui Kirenai Natsu ga Aru” (by Tom-H@ck) w/ Yumemi Nemu [Human] 03. “Sweet☆Planet” (by tilt-six × PandaBoY)
04. “Kanaria no Ippai” (by Yuuyu)
05. “Hitomi ni Tojite Ai ni Ikou” (by Yuyoyuppe ゆよ ゆっぺ)
06. “first love” (by Jun’ai no Kyojin-P)
07. “Ebiba! Dreamin” (by emon)
08. “Anzen UntenMuji Musume-chan” (by 八王子P Hachioji P)
09. “Woopie Island” (by Tamaya 2060%)
10. “Dream Dream Yume Dream” (by Nayutan Alien)
11. “Anywhere” (by livetune.kz)
12. “Aruiwa Yumemi Nemu to iu Gainen e no Sakushiido” (by MOSAIC.WAV) w/ Yumemi Nemu [Human]

Where to Order

The album is available at the following websites:

CDJapan

Animate International

Amazon Japan

Sources:
Dear Stage Blog, Natalie.mu

The post “VOCALOID yumemi nemu” Album Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: yumemi nemu Release Celebration Announced
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Fans of DEARSTAGE’s newest VOCALOID, yumemi nemu, rejoice! The company is holding several events​ to celebrate her release. This event includes classes on how to use nemu as well as a performance from nemu’s voice actress, also named Yumemi Nemu. Be sure to apply for your chance to be part of the yumemi nemu release …

The post yumemi nemu Release Celebration Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of DEARSTAGE’s newest VOCALOID, yumemi nemu, rejoice! The company is holding several events​ to celebrate her release. This event includes classes on how to use nemu as well as a performance from nemu’s voice actress, also named Yumemi Nemu. Be sure to apply for your chance to be part of the yumemi nemu release celebration!

About

As mentioned before, the event is being held in celebration of nemu’s release. Yumemi Nemu (the person) will be performing, and Kuroda Asin will be the guest lecturer.

Dates & Times

Date: Saturday, April 22nd
Location: TKP Conference Center in front of Nagoya Station, Conference room 5A
Website: http://www.kashikaigishitsu.net/facilitys/cc-nagoya-ekimae/access/
Doors open at 12:30 PM, and the event starts at 1:00 PM (JST)

Date: Sunday, April 23rd
Location: TKP Garden City Osaka-Umeda, Conference room 9B
Website: http://www.kashikaigishitsu.net/facilitys/gc-osaka-umeda/access/
Doors open at 12:30 PM, event starts at 1:00 PM (JST)

Date: Sunday, May 7th
Location: Yamaha Electone City Shibuya
Website: http://jp.yamaha.com/products/musical-instruments/keyboards/el-organs/electone_city_shibuya/
1st Event: Doors open at 11:30 AM, event begins at 12:00 PM (JST)
2nd Event: Doors open at 2:30 PM, event begins at 3:00 PM (JST)

Tickets

It costs ¥2,500 JPY (tax included) to reserve a seat. However, these seats aren’t open to just anyone.

How to Get Tickets

1. People who pre-ordered nemu’s software on the DEARSTAGE Online Store can register between April 6th at 6:00 PM (JST) and April 9th at 11:59 PM (JST) for a chance to be selected by lottery to receive a ticket to attend. Limit 1 ticket per serial number. Each ticket can only be used for one event.

2. People who purchased nemu’s software (boxed or digital version) can sign up here starting on April 14th at 6:00 PM (JST) until April 16th at 11:59 PM (JST) for a chance to be selected by lottery to receive a ticket. Limit 1 ticket per serial number. Each ticket can only be used for one event.

More Information

For more information, feel free to check out the official website (in Japanese).

Questions can be sent to inLYNK via info@inlynk.jp

The post yumemi nemu Release Celebration Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Yumemi Nemu and Tone Rion V4 are Now Available!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
It’s February 16th in Japan and you know what that means: the release of the new VOCALOIDs Yumemi Nemu and Tone Rion V4! About the VOCALOIDs While we knew some information about the two and previously reported it, there’s new information as well! Nemu AND Rion are both voiced by the Dempagumi.inc singer Yumemi Nemu. And …

The post Yumemi Nemu and Tone Rion V4 are Now Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s February 16th in Japan and you know what that means: the release of the new VOCALOIDs Yumemi Nemu and Tone Rion V4!

About the VOCALOIDs

While we knew some information about the two and previously reported it, there’s new information as well!

Nemu AND Rion are both voiced by the Dempagumi.inc singer Yumemi Nemu. And while there was one sample available of VOCALOID Nemu’s voice before, we now have a few more samples featuring both Nemu and Rion.

Rion is described as having a more nasally and childlike voice, while Nemu is supposed to sound slightly more grown-up.

It’s been confirmed that there are 138 extra voice recordings for Nemu, featuring special shouts and chants that “all Nemqn fans know and love!”

As mentioned before, the two voice banks can cross synthesize between each other as well, creating lots of opportunities!

The two are available as physical copies from the DEAR STAGE online store (Japanese only), but are also available for digital download on the English VOCALOID Store.

They’re available for ¥8,000 JPY each or ¥15,000 JPY together.

Tone Rion V4 Download
Yumemi Nemu Download
Nemurion Set Download

While Nemu’s digital download is open to everyone, it doesn’t include the extra VOCALOID lesson that the physical version has.

About the Voice Provider

In addition to providing information on the VOCALOIDs, the official VOCALOID Shop also gives us some info on the human behind them.

Nemu Yumemi (DEMPAGUMI.inc)

  • 170 cm
  • Born in Mie on July 14th
  • Type B

Catchphrase: “Dreaming of being an eternal magical girl!”

A super idol in the new era who connects Akihabara and the world! She has been expanding the scope of her activities such as directing pictures, writing columns, etc. as a pop icon, connecting cultures regardless of genre.

Nickname: Nemukyun
Theme Color: Mint Green
Otaku Genre: Otaku Research

vocaloid.com

The post Yumemi Nemu and Tone Rion V4 are Now Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster 3EX: Dream Party
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The upcoming VOCALOID Yumemi Nemu that is set to release on the 16th of this month will be featured in the upcoming game Groove Coaster 3EX: Dream Party coming out this spring! The arcade game was demoed today at Japan Amusement Expo 2017 (JAEPO).   The Collaboration Yumemi Nemu’s demo song “Anone… Jitsu wa Watashi, Yumemi …

The post Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster 3EX: Dream Party appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The upcoming VOCALOID Yumemi Nemu that is set to release on the 16th of this month will be featured in the upcoming game Groove Coaster 3EX: Dream Party coming out this spring! The arcade game was demoed today at Japan Amusement Expo 2017 (JAEPO).

 

The Collaboration

  1. Yumemi Nemu’s demo song “Anone… Jitsu wa Watashi, Yumemi Nemu Nanda…” (VOCALOID ver.) will become a playable song in the game!

2. Yumemi Nemu’s newly created original songs from famous VOCALOID producers will also become playable songs in the game. We do not know what these songs will be or who the producers are yet, but we will make an update as soon as we have more information on this. Stay tuned!

3. With the new “Navigator Switch” function, players will have the option to choose Yumemi Nemu as their game navigator! She will appear to give guidance and comments on the music selection screen, as well as before and after you play the game. Therefore, whenever you play the game, you will always see Nemu’s face on screen.

Note: There is no mention of Tone Rion V4 at the moment.

Links (Japanese)

DEMPAGUMI

Famitsu

More information on Yumemi Nemu and Tone Rion V4 can be found here.

The post Yumemi Nemu X Groove Coaster 3EX: Dream Party appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Tone Rion V4 & the New Yumemi Nemu VOCALOID!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Back in 2011, Tone Rion was released for the VOCALOID 3 engine by the company “Dear Stage (MoeJapan).” A few years later, it appeared as if we were not going to get many updates on her. Now, however, it seems that she is being revived for the VOCALOID 4 engine! Not only that, but also …

The post Tone Rion V4 & the New Yumemi Nemu VOCALOID! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Back in 2011, Tone Rion was released for the VOCALOID 3 engine by the company “Dear Stage (MoeJapan).” A few years later, it appeared as if we were not going to get many updates on her. Now, however, it seems that she is being revived for the VOCALOID 4 engine! Not only that, but also she is being released alongside a partner by the name of “Yumemi Nemu.”

Yumemi Nemu

Recommended Range: G#2 ~ F4
Recommended Tempo: 60 to 140 BPM

Voice Provider: 夢眠ねむ
Illustrator: Yukiko Horiguchi (Animator and Illustrator of K-On!)

She has over 130 different recordings.

Prices

Download Version: ¥8,000 JPY ($68 USD)
Physical Version: ¥10,000 JPY ($85 USD)
Starter Pack: ¥18,000 JPY ($153 USD) (Includes the VOCALOID 4 Editor and a bonus tutorial DVD with Nemu Yumemi giving lessons.)
Release Date: February 16th (Package version is yet to be determined.)

Yumemi Memu is based off of her voice provider who is a singer and an idol. She is also a member of Denpagumi Inc.!

 

 

 

 

Demo


Tone Rion V4

Recommended Range: A2 ~ F4
Recommended Tempo: 60 to 140 BPM

Illustrator: Yukiko Horiguchi (Animator and Illustrator of K-On!)

Prices

Download Version: ¥8,000 JPY ($68 USD)
V3 Upgrade Version (Download Only): ¥4,000 JPY ($34 USD)
Physical Version: ¥10,000 JPY ($153 USD)
Release Date: February 16th

She will come with the added “GROWL” function.

 

 

 

 

 

Both of these voice banks will have a cross-synthesis feature available between them. As of now, they are not compatible with other voice banks.

Stay tuned to VNN for all updates on these voice banks!

Links

Product Page
Dear Stage Online Store

The post Tone Rion V4 & the New Yumemi Nemu VOCALOID! appeared first on VNN.
